addresses.description: The IPv4 addresses this record set will point to.

name.description: The name of the record set. The zone argument will be appended to this value to create the full record path.

ttl.description: The TTL of the record set. Defaults to 3600.

zone.description: DNS zone the record set belongs to. It must be an FQDN, that is, include the trailing dot.

addresses.description: The IPv6 addresses this record set will point to.

name.description: The name of the record set. The zone argument will be appended to this value to create the full record path.

ttl.description: The TTL of the record set. Defaults to 3600.

zone.description: DNS zone the record set belongs to. It must be an FQDN, that is, include the trailing dot.

cname.description: The canonical name this record will point to.

name.description: The name of the record. The zone argument will be appended to this value to create the full record path.

ttl.description: The TTL of the record set. Defaults to 3600.

zone.description: DNS zone the record belongs to. It must be an FQDN, that is, include the trailing dot.

name.description: The name of the record set. The zone argument will be appended to this value to create the full record path.

nameservers.description: The nameservers this record set will point to.

ttl.description: The TTL of the record set. Defaults to 3600.

zone.description: DNS zone the record set belongs to. It must be an FQDN, that is, include the trailing dot.

name.description: The name of the record. The zone argument will be appended to this value to create the full record path.

ptr.description: The canonical name this record will point to.

ttl.description: The TTL of the record set. Defaults to 3600.

zone.description: DNS zone the record belongs to. It must be an FQDN, that is, include the trailing dot.
